CustomField.description:
This record will be removed once the TTL is passed. Automatic TTL can be set via Subscription Metadata.
Requires automatic record deletion schedule job is setup.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This record will be removed once the TTL is passed. Automatic TTL can be set via Subscription Metadata.
Requires automatic record deletion schedule job is setup.
CustomField.label: Time To Live
